title: For a Song and a Hundred Songs: A Poet's Journey through a Chine
description: Liao Yiwu (Chinese: Ã¥Â»â€“Ã¤ÂºÂ¦Ã¦Â­Â¦; also known as Lao Wei) (born 1958 in Sichuan), is a Chinese author, reporter, musician, and poet. He is a critic of China's Communist regime, for which he has been imprisoned. His books, several of which are collections of interviews with ordinary people from the lower rungs of Chinese society, were published in Taiwan and Hong Kong but are banned in mainland China; some have been translated into English, French, German and Polish.
